sentence_text: I had super much fun!
My kids enjoyed the stay so much and the football coach/entertainer was really nice and very fun!
Amazing staff especially towel lady Ay≈üe.
I love her smile she is so lovely.
Beautiful hotel - the staff were helpful and the food and facilities were excellent.
The choice of activities available and entertainment were just right.
The fireworks were an added extra!
We‚Äôre currently staying at the Titanic Deluxe Lara, and honestly, it‚Äôs been nothing short of amazing, despite the change of rooms on the first night (it was too small).
The whole place is stunning ‚Äî beautifully maintained, spotless, and full of energy.
Every single member of staff goes out of their way to make you feel welcome and relaxed.
The highlight of our trip so far has definitely been the cabana service.
Having our own private cabana by the pool has made our holiday feel truly luxurious ‚Äî comfortable loungers, chilled drinks, delicious snacks, and the most attentive staff we‚Äôve ever come across.
Our cabana host H√ºseyin has been incredible, always checking in to make sure we have everything we need before we even have to ask.
The food and drinks throughout the resort are top quality, with so much variety that every meal feels different.
The atmosphere is perfect ‚Äî lively when you want it to be, but peaceful when you just want to unwind.
Every detail here is so well thought out, and you can tell the staff genuinely care about guests having a great experience.
We‚Äôve already said we‚Äôll 100% be coming back ‚Äî it‚Äôs the perfect mix of luxury, comfort, and fun.
If you‚Äôre thinking about booking Titanic Deluxe Lara, don‚Äôt hesitate ‚Äî and definitely treat yourself to the cabana experience.
It‚Äôs worth every penny and has made our stay unforgettable.
Great family hotel, lots of things to do for the kids, kids club with soft play is ace.
Keeps little ones busy.
For adults great food and a great selection of drinks.
Areas clean and the teams around hotel are very nice and friendly.

Very nice hotel amazing staff, service is 5* 
I usually struggle to drink AI drinks not here, looking to return next year 
Beautiful weather

Nothing at all was a problem

and enterteiner yigit was amaying

Mal im Titanic Deluxe in Lara und  erneut sind es traumhafte Ferien.
Wie in all den Jahren zuvor haben wir f√ºr unseren gesamten Aufenthalt eine Beach Cabana genommen.
Der Cabana Service ist excellent, vor allem die Arbeit von Ahmed aber auch von allen anderen Mitarbeitern ist perfekt.
Immer sehr leckeres Mittagessen am Strand und die Cocktails von Ahmed und Aziz k√∂nnten nicht besser sein.
Es wird einem jeder Wunsch von den Augen abgelesen.
Diesmal haben wir zwei Zimmer gebucht, beide sind riesig und zu 100% sauber dank dem tollen Housekeeping welches jeden Tag tolle Arbeit leistet.
Vielen Dank an Murat, Ahmed, Aziz und Merve f√ºr alles!
Bis bald wieder :)

Angela is the best entertainment for anyone playing darts  and she is also very good at playing it also and adnan is also very very good entertainment team member he is always having good laughs with us and mustafa bar waiter is very pleasant young man and looked after me so much
Wie immer ist es eine positives Erlebnis hier.
Es ist sozusagen unser zweites zu Hause.
Sauberkeit, Freundlichkeit und gute Unterhaltung.
Wir kommen schon seit Jahren und werden es auch weiterhin tun.
Erste mal im Titanic mit Familie.
Early Check in sehr gut.
Buffet Auswahl sehr gut und internationale K√ºche.
Currently staying here as a group of 5 adults and 2 toddlers and are utterly disappointed with the hotel.

Having stayed at another hotel (Trendy Lara) in Lara Beach 3 months ago and had a great experience, we decided to push the boat out a little more for this trip as the reason for the holiday was to celebrate my Dad‚Äôs 70th Birthday which falls during the stay.

We paid around ¬£400 each more for this hotel than we could have got the Trendy Lara and based on reviews we thought we were going for a more deluxe holiday experience, this has been far from the case.
We arrived 10 mins after the main restaurant had closed and were made aware that we‚Äôd have to wait 1.5 hours for the midnight snack bar to open in order to have anything to eat.
We had 2 hungry toddlers with us, who needed to be fed and put to bed so this was far from ideal.

Having stayed at loads of all inclusive resorts all over Europe, I‚Äôve never know one not keep part of the restaurant open with a limited selection of food available for guest arriving late, even 3 star resorts offer this as standard.
After some complaining, the staff agreed to arrange room service for us however, it took so long to arrive that we were only 10 mins off the snack bar opening.
The hotel is generally tired and worn, in need of updating.
The door to the balcony in one of our rooms is broken and coming away from the frame, letting in a draught and noise.
The kids tables and chairs in the restaurant have seen much better days.
Generally everything is just in need of a revamp.
The staff are ‚Äúfine‚Äù, not rude for the most part (although a couple have been) but not particularly friendly either.

Drinks Service and clearing tables is very slow in the main restaurant, particularly at breakfast when we‚Äôve had to go hunt down someone to place drink orders every day so far, because there is no self service option.
The food is ‚Äúfine‚Äù but nothing special.
All very luke warm, pretty much the same every night.
Pretty standard all inclusive except that this is meant to be a 5* resort and by comparison to our experience at the other hotel a few months back, falls very short.
There, we had so much more choice, so many stations where food was prepared fresh, variety from one night to the next and food was actually hot.
There are a few additional options for lunch, down towards the beach.

We had to queue for a while for the Italian lunch restaurant and then half the table‚Äôs food was brought over so long before the other half that they‚Äôd finished eating before the others had received theirs.
The staff didn‚Äôt seem at all bothered by our frustration over this, as 3 adults had finished their food whilst 2 adults and 2 toddlers were sat waiting for theirs.
There are a la carte restaurant options during the evenings, but all at a cost.
The one thing they do have that exceeds our experience elsewhere is the kids club.
This has been recently refurbished and includes a great soft play and lots of activity rooms, which are all very clean and full of things to keep the kids entertained.
Generally, the hotel is ‚Äúfine‚Äù.
Nothing at all special, no extra little bits that you‚Äôd expect from a 5* resort to elevate the experience.
It is a 4* resort at best and absolutely not worth the extra money.
Save your money and go to Trendy Lara or one of the other resorts in the area.
We‚Äôre so gutted that we ‚Äúsplashed out‚Äù on this as a treat for a special occasion, expecting my Dad‚Äôs 70th to be something truly special, when this just won‚Äôt be the case.
Wat een heerlijke luxe ervaring!

As someone who is apprehensive about what I book, i can honestly say this is a beautiful hotel.
There is a few points that can be worked on but I will give the good and the bad.

Good :
‚Ä¢ Clean facilities, overall well maintained hotel.
‚Ä¢ Clean towels and pool towels daily.
‚Ä¢ Entertainment for children and the kids club is amazing.
‚Ä¢ Pool and loungers and high quality and lots to do by the pool.
Option of relaxing areas as well as kids pools and music playing.
‚Ä¢staff by the pool on roller skates, always coming round offering drinks.
‚Ä¢drinks were nice and plenty of options.

Bad :
‚Ä¢ Food choices limited - we found the buffet especially on the evening to be repetitive and poor quality of food.
We really struggled with this and my partner actually felt like he was on rations.
Snacks in the day are limited by the pool with only fruit, ice cream or waffles available.
Jacket potato bar open 4pm-6pm.
If you want nicer food the beach bars are your best bet but again limited timings for this.
We really struggled with the food at this hotel.
My children didn‚Äôt eat very well.
‚Ä¢waiters in the buffet were often abrupt/rude.
They couldn‚Äôt speak very good English and only understood coke or tea/orange juice.
They would only come to you once for a drink.
I did not find them very helpful.
‚Ä¢bar waiters again were abrupt.
Only the ones on the roller skates or the ones serving food I found to be polite.
The waiters at the beach bars were also rude/abrupt.
‚Ä¢ storage for clothes in the rooms were very little, struggled as a family of 4 to unpack all of our clothes.
There were 3 drawers and about 5 coat hangers.
‚Ä¢ I wouldn‚Äôt say there is loads to do at this hotel.
Overall it is a lovely clean hotel.
There is a lot that can be improved on especially when it comes to the food.
